headline: China Ramps Up a War of Words, Warning the U.S. of Its Red Lines
text: The soldiers run through the forest, through the surf, through smoke and flames, ready to die for the motherland. The video, one of a series that has recently appeared online in China, climaxes with the launch of nine ballistic missiles and a fiery barrage of explosions.
snippet: As the United States and Taiwan draw closer, state propaganda is sending the message that China will go to war if necessary.
